item.title: Granting Access
item.description: Switch to the Access tab. Use Add User or Add Users from List to select the user to add Select role from Owners Members Collaborators User roles The following table outlines the permissions given to each role. Permission Owners Members Collaborators Data - Create ✓ ✓ ✗ Data - Read/Download ✓ ✓ ✓ Data - Update ✓ ✓ ✗ Data - Delete ✓ ✗ ✗ User - Add/Remove ✓ ✗ ✗ User - Change role ✓ ✗ ✗

item.title: Request Storage
item.description: Note Default limits on collections are 1TB storage and 1 million files. If either limit is reached, it will lock you out of your files. Use the following steps to request to request an increase in storage size and/or file count limit: Step 1 Go to rdm.uq.edu.au, login and select your RDM collection Step 2 Click the Request more storage button (shown below) Step 3 Fill the form with the relevant details and Submit.
